special_text:
[+1]: Discard a card, then draw a card.
[+1]: Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control with mana value 2 or less. The copy gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.
[-3]: Exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard, copy it and you may cast the copy. The copy costs {2} less to cast.
